mapper.select: select c3.*,u1.user_alias,u1.user_imageUrl,u2.user_alias c2_alias,u2.user_imageUrl c2_url from ( select c1.*,c2.comment_id c2_id,c2.parent_id c2_pid,c2.np_id c2_npid,c2.comment_date c2_date,c2.comment_content c2_content,c2.user_id c2_uid,c2.`status` c2_status from comment c1 left join comment c2 on c2.parent_id=c1.comment_id where c1.np_id=#{np_id} and c1.parent_id=0 and c1.`status`=1 ) c3 left join userinfo u1 on u1.user_id=c3.user_id and u1.user_power != 0 left join userinfo u2 on u2.user_id=c3.c2_uid and u2.user_power != 0

select c3.*,u1.user_alias,u1.user_imageUrl,u2.user_alias c2_alias,u2.user_imageUrl c2_url from ( select c1.*,c2.comment_id c2_id,c2.parent_id c2_pid,c2.np_id c2_npid,c2.comment_date c2_date,c2.comment_content c2_content,c2.user_id c2_uid,c2.`status` c2_status from comment c1 left join comment c2 on c2.parent_id=c1.comment_id -- 如果user_id匹配，则status=1或者=0都显示 -- 即可访问自己发表的未审核的评论 where c1.np_id=#{np_id} and c1.parent_id=0 and if(c1.user_id = #{user_id},c1.`status`=1 or c1.`status`=0,c1.`status`=1) ) c3 left join userinfo u1 on u1.user_id=c3.user_id and u1.user_power != 0 left join userinfo u2 on u2.user_id=c3.c2_uid and u2.user_power != 0
